title: Lees SDK: __OSThreadInit
description: Bestudeer SDK implementatie en headers.
close_reason: OSThread.c: __OSThreadInit() initializes DefaultThread (state RUNNING, attr DETACH, prio/base 16, suspend=0, val=-1, mutex NULL), init queueJoin/queueMutex; sets __OSFPUContext=&thread->context; OSClearContext/OSSetCurrentContext; stackBase=_stack_addr, stackEnd=_stack_end; writes OS_THREAD_STACK_MAGIC to *stackEnd; OSSetCurrentThread; resets RunQueueBits/RunQueueHint; init RunQueue[prio] for all priorities; init __OSActiveThreadQueue and add DefaultThread; OSClearContext(IdleContext); Reschedule=0. Uses globals RunQueueBits/RunQueueHint/Reschedule, RunQueue[32], DefaultThread, __OSActiveThreadQueue @ OS_BASE_CACHED+0x00DC.
